full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,TSE THAR GTONG TSUL DANG BCAS PA DBANG PO RNAMS LA RTEN DANG SPYAN GZIGS GO GSER SKYEMS DANG GTOR MA SOGS PHYI NANG GSANG GSUM MCHOD PA 'BUL BA'I NGO MTSAR BRGYA BYIN 'GRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(ZHES GA-YANG DVA SGO BZHI'I TSE THAR GTONG TSUL DANG BCAS PA DBANG PO RNAMS LA 'BUL BA'I NGO MTSAR RGYAN GYI 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA 'DI NI, SNGAGS 'TSANG SPOR PA KHA CHE'I THOD YID GYI RGYAL KHAMS SBYAR BA'I YID CHA DANG, BLA MA'I RAG SPUN PA'I MDZAD PA'I YIG CHA GNYIS LA GZHI BYA LA CUNG, KHA SKONG DKOS RNAMS KYI KHA SGANG NAS LEGS PA'I DON CHA THAMS CAD PHYOGS CIG TU BYAS NAS, GZHAN PHAN GYI BSAM NAS BSGRIGS PA DGE ZHING BKRA SHIS, 'ON KYANG 'BON SOGS DKYIL CHAS 'DI DU TSE THAR RNAMS TSIG GI SGO NAS, LHA 'DI LTA BU BTZAN ZER BA DANG, YIG CHA RNAMS BON LUGS SU DAR 'DUG PA'I THANG BSAM, AU RGYAN PADMA'I GSUNG LAS, DUS NGAN BSKAL BA'I SNYIGS MA LA, BKA' GZHIN MI BYED RANG ZO YIS BAN DANG BON GYI LHA BSRUNG RNAMS` @009B 'TSOL BUR GSOL MCHOD BYED PA DANG, DGE SDIG 'TSOL BUR BYED PA'I DUS, MI 'DOD SNA TSOGS 'BYUNGS PA DIS, ZHES GSUNGS PA'I DE BZHIN DANG RANG GI LHA SRUNG RING LUGS KYI SGO NA LA MCHOD DKOD PA NI, LUNG LAS GSUNG BA BZHIN KUN GYIS YID CHES PA'I GNAS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,SHU BH'Am, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
